function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of formal agency for ethical approval of survey studies","Impact":"Potential ethical concerns and lack of oversight for questionnaire-based survey studies","Mitigation":"Establish a clear ethical review process and oversight for questionnaire-based survey studies","Technologies":"Ethics committee review processes, ethical guidelines, data protection frameworks","People":"Participants in questionnaire-based survey studies","Owner":"Institutional ethics committees, research organizations"},{"Description":"Anonymized data may still pose privacy risks","Impact":"Risk of re-identification of participants despite pseudonymization","Mitigation":"Use advanced anonymization techniques, such as differential privacy, to lower the risk of re-identification","Technologies":"Differential privacy algorithms, privacy-preserving data sharing tools","People":"Participants in the survey, data protection authorities","Owner":"Data protection authorities, research organizations"},{"Description":"Use of implied consent for survey participation","Impact":"Potential for misunderstanding and lack of explicit consent from participants","Mitigation":"Implement clear consent processes and ensure participants understand the implications of implied consent","Technologies":"Informed consent frameworks, consent management platforms","People":"Participants in questionnaire-based survey studies","Owner":"Research organizations, survey organizers"}]}
